info.title: Service Contract (A2X)
info.description:
You can use this service to integrate external applications with service contract processing. In each API call, you can use the following operations:
* Retrieve all service contracts, or use the provided filters to retrieve specific service contracts.
* Create a service contract, service contract partner, service contract items, partner of service contract item, item billing request lines, price elements at billing request line level, item price elements, item reference objects, and products in the item product list.
* Update a specific service contract item, service contract partner, partner of service contract item, item billing request line, price element at billing request line level, item price element, item reference object, or product in the item product list.
* Delete a specific service contract item, partner of service contract item, item billing request line, price element at billing request line level, item price element, item reference object, or product in the item product list. Note that deleting a service contract is not possible.
* Cancel a service contract or cancel a service contract item.

x-sap-shortText: Manage service contracts using this synchronous inbound service

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Service Item (CRMS4_SERV_I)
* Service Header (CRMS4_SERV_H)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

tags.name: Price Element of Billing Request Line
Price Element of Service Contract Item

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET ServiceContract HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

top.name: $top

skip.name: $skip
